name: scg3
tagline: Extensible C++11/OpenGL scene graph library for teching computer graphics
body:

University of Applied Sciences and Arts Hannover, Germany In preparation ... ### Welcome to GitHub Pages. This automatic page generator is the easiest way to create beautiful pages for all of your projects. Author your page content here using GitHub Flavored Markdown, select a template crafted by a designer, and publish. After your page is generated, you can check out the new branch: ``` $ cd your_repo_root/repo_name $ git fetch origin $ git checkout gh-pages ``` If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
